William Downey-Schell

Full Stack Developer

Full-stack developer with a passion for learning and using front-end frameworks, while keeping back-end functionality in mind. I practice attention to detail, have the ability to learn quickly and apply that knowledge, and I enjoy collaboration. As a software developer I seek to develop tools that will promote health, creativity, and productivity.

aVuToDo

A full-stack app using Vue.js as the front-end framework. I learned Vue in 3 days and created a sleek, simple To-Do app with user authentication.

PetRex

Full-stack MERN app utilizing Yelp and Cloudinary API’s. Users can keep track of all their pet medical records in one place. Part of a 3-person team requiring a development strategy, troubleshooting, and version control.

TacoTavern

A full-stack app using PostgresQL, Node, and Express EJS. Utilizing 2 API’s, users can browse taco recipes and beer descriptions to find their favorite pairings. Sign in, save your favorite tacos or beer, and add recipes you love.

Platt'n'Putt

For my first project I used JavaScript and Phaser.IO to create a ‘platformer-style’ miniature golf game.
